snippet.title: RIFT Free-to-Play Announcement Gameplay Trailer HD
snippet.description:
RIFT is going Free-to-Play. Starting in June you will get access to the full game completely free. Read more about it here: http://www.mmobomb.com/news/rift-is-going-free-to-play/

RIFT is a 3D MMORPG from Trion Worlds. In Rift players can choose from a myriad of souls and combine them to create a truly unique class. The MMORPG offers dynamic events in the form of rifts which appear in zones and force players to cooperate in order to fight against the spreading evil.

http://www.mmobomb.com for the best free MMORPG and MMO Games.
